title: Scream 3
creator_credit: Wes Craven, Marianne Maddalena, Kevin Williamson, Cathy Konrad, Konrad Pictures and Dimension Films
brief_description: The third instalment of the Scream series (Scream 1996, Scream 2 1997) by horror cult director Wes Craven featuring original cast members Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox Arquette and David Arquette along with new members Parker Posey, Patrick Dempsey, Scott Foley and Jenny Mc Carthy.
